1.title: Sophie Gets a New Place
1.plot: Sophie wants to assert her independence and move into her own place with best friend Rachel, and Shannon wants to help - a lot. But when Sophie pushes her Mom aside, things go downhill fast.

2.title: Sophie Goes to Nashville
2.plot: The mother daughter duo head to Nashville so Sophie can catch up on her songwriting and Shannon can get some new hair extensions, but after Shannon's attempt to bolster Sophie's music career goes awry, the leisurely trip turns into a high pressure performance.

3.title: Shannon and Sophie Go to Whistler
3.plot: Shannon bets Gene she won't shop all weekend, and Sophie swears off first dates. But the gals make it harder on themselves when they head for Whistler... and run into Property Brother Jonathan Scott, who tempts them on both fronts.

4.title: Shannon Goes to the Dogs
4.plot: Shannon decides to hold a dog adoption fair at the house, despite Gene's concern that she'll wind up adopting all of the dogs herself. Meanwhile, Sophie enlists roommate Rachel's help in trying to figure out what's wrong with her seemingly perfect new boyfriend.

5.title: Sophie Sings the Anthem
5.plot: Landing a gig to sing the Canadian national anthem at a Vancouver football game is an honour for Sophie Tweed-Simmons, but when press coverage and online chatter converge with rumours of nepotism, a frustrated Sophie lashes out with a newsworthy slight of her rock star father. Shannon has lived in Gene's rock star shadow for 30 years but her efforts to console Sophie are derailed by her hunt to remember a mysterious anniversary that Gene has clearly remembered and plans to mark the occasion with something spectacular.

6.title: Sophie Gets a Mortgage
6.plot: It's a battle over turf when Sophie finds a "for sale" sign on the home she's renting and Shannon and Gene deal with hoarder issues at the Simmons mansion. But Shannon's unusual technique for problem solving leads to a win-win-win proposition.

7.title: Sophie's Not a Size 2
7.plot: Spurred by LA's obsession with thinness, Sophie jokes online that she is extreme-dieting. She returns from a trip to Nashville to find the comment has sparked unwanted rumours about her - but after advice from Shannon, she finds a novel way to set the record straight.

8.title: Shannon and Sophie Against the Clock
8.plot: With Sophie on a mission to showcase designers who create fashion in more than just Size 2, she and Shannon fly to Vancouver to meet local couturier Malene Grotrian. But unexpected delays on a side trip to Whistler threaten to make them late for the major red carpet event in L.A. at which Sophie is supposed to wear one of Malene's dresses, forcing them to take desperate measures.

imdb.plot outline: Celebrity Mother and Daughter, Shannon and Sophie are best friends and polar opposites, and together this diamond duo of Gene Simmons Family Jewels fame are navigating the everyday challenges of celebrity life while Sophie spreads her wings to leave the nest and Shannon flies closely and protectively behind.
imdb.title: Shannon & Sophie
plot: Celebrity Mother and Daughter, Shannon and Sophie are best friends and polar opposites, and together this diamond duo of Gene Simmons Family Jewels fame are navigating the everyday challenges of celebrity life while Sophie spreads her wings to leave the nest and Shannon flies closely and protectively behind.::Anonymous
